body:
Dear [Recipient],

I hope this email finds you well. It's been a while since we last caught up, and I wanted to check in and see how things are going on your end. I've been keeping busy with a few projects lately, but I'm always interested in hearing about what you've been up to.

I also wanted to touch base about some potential future plans. I know we've both been pretty swamped lately, but I think it would be great if we could find some time to connect and discuss some ideas I've been thinking about. Of course, I understand if your schedule is too packed at the moment, but I thought it wouldn't hurt to put the idea out there.

In any case, I hope to hear back from you soon. Take care and have a great week!

Best regards,
[Your Name]
subject: Upcoming Meeting
